name: Angela Olovson
bio: As a software engineering immersive student, Angela Olovson is committed to combining her diverse skillset with her technical expertise to create innovative solutions and impactful software. With a background in fashion allocation analysis and floristry, she brings a unique perspective to software development, combining creativity and analytical thinking to solve complex problems. As she graduates from GA this July, she is excited to leverage her skills and experience to build cutting-edge technology that makes a difference in the world.
